name: Horny Chronicles
description:
Gay sexual themes, storytelling and imagery.

Embark on this story of self discovery, sexual frustration and confusion, where you will guide this young boy through some very risky endeavors and borderline incestuous adventures with his older brother and Dad.

this is adapted from a Story that I previously published on Nifty, it is my very first experience with Text based adventure games, expect this to be built on and improved with time.

don't be shy to give me any and all kinds of input, opinions feedback and constructive criticism in the comments or over at my instagram. 

@_ach.raf
